snippet.title: Mega Man 42 Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Mega Man 42 at http://www.indiedb.com/games/mega-man-42/downloads/mega-man-42-v10-release.

In 2001, Daniel "Servadac" Jonsson and his friend came up with the idea that they would make their own Mega Man game. They came up with a few robot master names and drew some pixel art, but nothing really became of the project. Then four months ago, a number of different occurrences led to Servadac to creating a Mega Man engine on his computer. That engine became Mega Man 42.

Fight your way through eight new robot master stages, 31 unique enemies, five Wily stages, and over four brutal Wily boss fights! Play as Mega Man or Roll for a completely different gameplay experience! All for free on your computer!

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/MegaMan42
Page on IndieDB - http://www.indiedb.com/games/mega-man-42
Servadac's Game Development Blog - http://servadacsgamedev.blogspot.com/
Mike Thal's Website - http://mikethal.com/
Dan Butler's SoundCloud - https://soundcloud.com/dbproduction-1
